channel.title: Hugo on TrozWare
channel.description: Recent content in Hugo on TrozWare

item.title: Moving to Hugo
item.description: Yesterday, I came to update my blog: I had a new post in draft form and I wanted to update the Swift code to version 4. However installing High Sierra had removed Jekyll which is the site generator that I had been using. I re-installed Jekyll but found that it had been updated from version 2 to version 3.
